    Package Description
    com.meterware.httpunit
    Classes for testing http server systems.

      WebLink WebImage.getLink() 
      WebLink[] HTMLSegment.getLinks()
      Returns the links found in this HTML segment in the order in which they appear.

      Returns the links found in the page in the order in which they appear.
      WebLink HTMLSegment.getLinkWith(java.lang.String text)
      Returns the first link which contains the specified text.

      Returns the link found in the page with the specified ID.

      Returns the first link which contains an image with the specified text as its 'alt' attribute.

      Returns the first link which contains an image with the specified text as its 'alt' attribute.

      Returns the link found in the page with the specified name.
